title: The Dam builders
creator_credit: Melbourne and Metropolitan Board of Works and Cine Service
brief_description: Gives a brief history of the Melbourne water supply system and the efforts of the MMBW to create enjoyable environments such as landscaping and recreation facilities in several catchment areas. Highlights the construction of the Cardinia Reservoir, near Emerald, now the largest storage area for Melbourne.
